mapper.insert:
insert into td_ca_operation_apply
hospital_code, apply_form_no, order_no, patient_id, case_no, admission_no, hospitalized_count, patient_name, sex, age, apply_dept_cd, apply_dept_name, apply_doc_cd, apply_doc_name, apply_date, exec_dept_cd, exec_dept_name, plan_oper_time, oper_type_cd, unplan_oper_flag, major_oper_flag, preoper_diag1_cd, preoper_diag1_name, preoper_diag1_prefix, preoper_diag1_suffix, preoper_diag2_cd, preoper_diag2_name, preoper_diag2_prefix, preoper_diag2_suffix, preoper_diag3_cd, preoper_diag3_name, preoper_diag3_prefix, preoper_diag3_suffix, preoper_diag4_cd, preoper_diag4_name, preoper_diag4_prefix, preoper_diag4_suffix, plan_oper1_cd, plan_oper1_name, plan_oper1_prefix, plan_oper1_suffix, plan_oper2_cd, plan_oper2_name, plan_oper2_prefix, plan_oper2_suffix, plan_oper3_cd, plan_oper3_name, plan_oper3_prefix, plan_oper3_suffix, plan_oper4_cd, plan_oper4_name, plan_oper4_prefix, plan_oper4_suffix, oper_level_cd, oper_level_name, oper_inci_cd, oper_inci_name, oper_position_cd, oper_position_name, oper_site_cd, oper_site_name, oper_doc_cd, oper_doc_name, oper_aid1_cd, oper_aid1_name, oper_aid2_cd, oper_aid2_name, oper_aid3_cd, oper_aid3_name, circulat_nurse1_cd, circulat_nurse1_name, circulat_nurse2_cd, circulat_nurse2_name, anest_meth_cd, anest_meth_name, anest_cd, anest_name, plan_oper_duration_hour, plan_oper_duration_min, oper_room, oper_room_cd, oper_table, abo_cd, abo_name, rh_cd, rh_name, hbv, hiv, hcv, tp, hbv_name, hiv_name, hcv_name, tp_name, red_blood_cell, platelet, plasma, whole_blood, device_req, other_note, visitors, status, oper_date, audit_doc_cd, audit_doc_name, audit_date, shift_nurse_cd, shift_nurse_name, shift_date, alt_date, alt_per_code, alt_per_name, audit_remark,
#{hospitalCode}, #{applyFormNo}, #{orderNo}, #{patientId}, #{caseNo}, #{admissionNo}, #{hospitalizedCount}, #{patientName}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{applyDeptCd}, #{applyDeptName}, #{applyDocCd}, #{applyDocName}, #{applyDate}, #{execDeptCd}, #{execDeptName}, #{planOperTime}, #{operTypeCd}, #{unplanOperFlag}, #{majorOperFlag}, #{preoperDiag1Cd}, #{preoperDiag1Name}, #{preoperDiag1Prefix}, #{preoperDiag1Suffix}, #{preoperDiag2Cd}, #{preoperDiag2Name}, #{preoperDiag2Prefix}, #{preoperDiag2Suffix}, #{preoperDiag3Cd}, #{preoperDiag3Name}, #{preoperDiag3Prefix}, #{preoperDiag3Suffix}, #{preoperDiag4Cd}, #{preoperDiag4Name}, #{preoperDiag4Prefix}, #{preoperDiag4Suffix}, #{planOper1Cd}, #{planOper1Name}, #{planOper1Prefix}, #{planOper1Suffix}, #{planOper2Cd}, #{planOper2Name}, #{planOper2Prefix}, #{planOper2Suffix}, #{planOper3Cd}, #{planOper3Name}, #{planOper3Prefix}, #{planOper3Suffix}, #{planOper4Cd}, #{planOper4Name}, #{planOper4Prefix}, #{planOper4Suffix}, #{operLevelCd}, #{operLevelName}, #{operInciCd}, #{operInciName}, #{operPositionCd}, #{operPositionName}, #{operSiteCd}, #{operSiteName}, #{operDocCd}, #{operDocName}, #{operAid1Cd}, #{operAid1Name}, #{operAid2Cd}, #{operAid2Name}, #{operAid3Cd}, #{operAid3Name}, #{circulatNurse1Cd}, #{circulatNurse1Name}, #{circulatNurse2Cd}, #{circulatNurse2Name}, #{anestMethCd}, #{anestMethName}, #{anestCd}, #{anestName}, #{planOperDurationHour}, #{planOperDurationMin}, #{operRoom}, #{operRoomCd}, #{operTable}, #{aboCd}, #{aboName}, #{rhCd}, #{rhName}, #{hbv}, #{hiv}, #{hcv}, #{tp}, #{hbvName}, #{hivName}, #{hcvName}, #{tpName}, #{redBloodCell}, #{platelet}, #{plasma}, #{wholeBlood}, #{deviceReq}, #{otherNote}, #{visitors}, #{status}, #{operDate}, #{auditDocCd}, #{auditDocName}, #{auditDate}, #{shiftNurseCd}, #{shiftNurseName}, #{shiftDate}, #{altDate}, #{altPerCode}, #{altPerName}, #{auditRemark},
mapper.delete:
delete from td_ca_operation_apply where apply_form_no in
#{applyFormNo}
mapper.update: update td_ca_operation_apply set apply_form_no =#{newApplyFormNo} where apply_form_no =#{oldApplyFormNo}
mapper.select:
select apply_form_no, order_no, status from td_ca_operation_apply where order_no in
#{orderNo}
mapper.update:
update td_ca_operation_apply
status = #{status}, oper_date = to_date(#{operDate},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), audit_doc_cd = #{auditDocCd}, audit_doc_name = #{auditDocName}, audit_date = to_date(#{auditDate},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), shift_nurse_cd = #{shiftNurseCd}, shift_nurse_name = #{shiftNurseName}, shift_date = to_date(#{shiftDate},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), alt_date =#{altDate}, alt_per_code = #{altPerCode}, alt_per_name = #{altPerName}, audit_remark = #{auditRemark}, device_nurse_cd1 = #{deviceNurseCd1}, device_nurse_name1 = #{deviceNurseName1}, device_nurse_cd2 = #{deviceNurseCd2}, device_nurse_name2 = #{deviceNurseName2}, anest_aid_cd = #{anestAidCd}, anest_aid_name = #{anestAidName},
OPE_ANEST_METH_CD = #{anestMethCd}, OPE_ANEST_METH_NAME = #{anestMethName}, anest_cd = #{anestCd}, anest_name = #{anestName}, oper_room = #{operRoom}, oper_table = #{operTable},
where apply_form_no = #{applyFormNo}
mapper.select: select count(PATIENT_ID) from TD_CA_OPERATION_APPLY where trunc(OPER_DATE)=trunc(sysdate) and APPLY_DEPT_CD=#{deptCode}

select count(1) as totalCount, sum(case when OPER_TYPE_CD = 1 then 1 else 0 end) as jzCount, sum(case when OPER_TYPE_CD = 2 then 1 else 0 end) as zqCount
from td_ca_operation_apply t where t.status in ('08') and to_char(t.in_room_time, 'yyyy-MM-dd') = #{currentDate} and exec_dept_cd = #{deptCd}
